situation: During a school assembly with loud music and bright lights, M began to cover his ears and showed signs of distress, becoming increasingly agitated.
action: The TA guided M to a quiet corner of the hall and provided him with noise-canceling headphones while speaking softly to reassure him. After a few minutes, M was able to focus on the presentation while wearing the headphones and returned to his class with a calm demeanor.
effect: M's anxiety was quickly addressed with the headphones and reassurance, allowing him to participate in the assembly without further distress.
